name: Money Monkey
description:
Become a monkey and go back to your roots by collecting money, the root of all evil, which can buy you bananas. The controls aren't explained in the game, so here goes:

a,d : move left and right

shift: high jump

space : jump / grab rope or vine

w : wallclimb

In case you cannot complete a section of the parkour, buy more bananas and see what abilities it gives you ;)
